text: Alan Muir (2 January 1922 – 20 September 1996) was a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Fitzroy Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1922 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Ivanhoe Amateurs Football Club players
title: Alan Muir (footballer)
